name: Discs Of Tron
description: Single Player, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 1-2, Local Multiplayer 1-2, HD (High Definition). The arcade classic is back!  Play Discs Of Tron and battle Sark for video-warrior supremacy.  Twelve levels of disc-hurling action await! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/Live/accounts.
